sprintGoal: Complete News Module with advanced features including media management, RSS, and model tracker pages

tasks.title: Implement media library backend API
tasks.description: Create comprehensive media management system with folder organization, CDN integration, and automatic image optimization
acceptanceCriteria: Automatic thumbnail generation (3 sizes: sm, md, lg)
Image metadata stored (dimensions, size, format, alt text)
Search media by filename, tags, folder
Usage tracking (which articles use which images)
Image optimization on upload (compression, format conversion)

technicalNotes.storage: AWS S3 or local storage with CDN

tasks.title: Build media library UI component
tasks.description: Create rich media management interface with drag-drop upload, folder navigation, and image selection modal
acceptanceCriteria: Drag-and-drop file upload with progress indicators
Grid/list view toggle for media display
Media picker modal for article editor integration

technicalNotes.libraries: react-dropzone for upload, react-grid-gallery for display
technicalNotes.integration: Used in article editor (Tiptap image insertion)

tasks.title: Implement article scheduling system
tasks.description: Enable scheduled publishing of articles with cron job processing and status management
acceptanceCriteria: Bull queue job runs every minute checking scheduled articles
Auto-publish articles when scheduled_publish_at is reached
Notifications sent to author on publish
Can edit/cancel scheduled articles before publish time
Scheduled articles not visible to public until published
Admin dashboard shows upcoming scheduled articles

technicalNotes.database: Add scheduled_publish_at column to articles table

tasks.title: Build article revision history system
tasks.description: Track and display last 20 versions of each article with diff view and restore capability
acceptanceCriteria: article_revisions table stores snapshots on save
Keep last 20 revisions per article (auto-delete older)
Store title, content, summary, metadata changes
Admin can view all revisions, authors can view own
Revisions read-only except for restore action

technicalNotes.diff: Use diff library (jsdiff) for change highlighting
technicalNotes.storage: JSON column for snapshot, or TEXT for content

tasks.title: Create revision history UI
tasks.description: Build interface to view, compare, and restore article revisions
acceptanceCriteria: Revision history panel in article editor sidebar
Timeline view showing all revisions with timestamps
Click revision to preview that version

tasks.title: Implement RSS feed generation
tasks.description: Generate RSS feeds for articles with category filtering and automatic updates
acceptanceCriteria: RSS items include: title, description, pubDate, link, guid
Feed updates automatically on new article publish

technicalNotes.library: rss npm package for feed generation

tasks.title: Create model tracker pages backend
tasks.description: Build dedicated pages for each LLM with aggregated news, specs, and community content
acceptanceCriteria: llm_models table with 47+ models (GPT-4, Claude, Llama, etc.)
Each model has: name, slug, provider, description, specs, pricing, status
Model specs: context_window, size, modalities, release_date
API quickstart code snippets per model

tasks.title: Build model tracker page UI
tasks.description: Create rich model detail pages with tabs for news, discussions, jobs, and specs
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with model name, provider, status
Quick stats cards (context window, size, release date)
Tabbed interface: Overview, News, Discussions, Jobs, Specs
News tab shows related articles (infinite scroll)
Jobs tab shows positions using this model
Specs tab shows detailed technical specifications
API quickstart code block with syntax highlighting

tasks.title: Implement related articles algorithm
tasks.description: Build recommendation system showing 3+ related articles based on content similarity
acceptanceCriteria: Algorithm considers: same category (weight 40%), shared tags (30%), content similarity (30%)
Uses TF-IDF or embeddings for content similarity
Results cached for 1 hour per article
Falls back to popular articles if insufficient matches
Updates cache when article is published/updated

technicalNotes.algorithm: Hybrid: category match + tag overlap + text similarity
technicalNotes.similarity: Use PostgreSQL pg_trgm extension or external vector DB
technicalNotes.fallback: If <3 matches, fill with popular articles from same category

tasks.title: Add related articles section to article pages
tasks.description: Display related articles widget at bottom of article detail pages
acceptanceCriteria: Related articles section appears below article content
Shows 3-6 related articles in card grid
Each card shows: thumbnail, title, excerpt, date
Responsive layout (1 col mobile, 3 cols desktop)
Graceful handling if no related articles
Section header: 'Related Articles' or 'You Might Also Like'
Analytics tracking for related article clicks

tasks.title: Implement article view tracking and analytics
tasks.description: Track article views, reading time, and engagement metrics for analytics
acceptanceCriteria: Tracks: user_id, article_id, timestamp, time_on_page, scroll_depth
Analytics include: total views, unique views, avg time, bounce rate
Trending algorithm considers: recent views, time_on_page, recency
Performance: use background job for heavy analytics
Admin dashboard shows article performance metrics

technicalNotes.table: article_views (article_id, user_id, ip_hash, viewed_at, time_on_page, scroll_depth)
technicalNotes.deduplication: Check view exists with WHERE user_id = ? AND article_id = ? AND viewed_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 24h
technicalNotes.aggregation: Materialized view or cron job for daily rollups

tasks.title: Add analytics tracking to article pages
tasks.description: Implement client-side tracking for views, reading time, and scroll depth
acceptanceCriteria: Track article view on page mount
Calculate estimated reading time from word count
Track actual time spent on page (active tab only)
Send analytics data on page unmount or visibility change
Debounce analytics calls (send max once per 30 seconds)
Handle page refresh (save progress to localStorage)
Display 'X min read' badge on article

technicalNotes.visibility: Page Visibility API to detect tab switches

tasks.title: Test news module advanced features
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of media library, scheduling, revisions, RSS, model tracker, and analytics
acceptanceCriteria: Media library upload works with various image formats
CDN URLs properly generated and images load
Article scheduling publishes at correct time
Scheduled articles properly hidden until publish time
Revision history shows all changes accurately
Revision restore works without data loss
RSS feed validates and displays in RSS readers
Model tracker pages load all related content
Article analytics track views and time correctly
All features work on mobile devices

technicalNotes.tools: Playwright for E2E, Jest for unit tests
technicalNotes.manual: Test RSS in Feedly, create scheduled articles and verify auto-publish
technicalNotes.performance: Lighthouse audit for model tracker pages

notes: Sprint 3 completes the News module with all advanced features required for MVP. Focus on performance and caching for model tracker pages. Ensure RSS feed is valid and well-structured. The related articles algorithm is critical for engagement - consider A/B testing different weighting strategies.
risks: CDN integration may require additional configuration
Related articles algorithm may need tuning for accuracy
Model tracker pages may have performance issues with many articles
